availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

person.persName: William B. Roberts (Owen County, Kentucky, attorney and county court judge)

body.p: Owen County, Kentucky, attorney and county court judge. Kentucky native. Son of Willis Roberts and Letita Roberts. Married to Mary Ann Herndon in Scott County, Kentucky, on October 4, 1852. Father of Zach H. Roberts and William B. Roberts, Jr. Married to Susie Green in Owen County, Kentucky, on May 18, 1864. Attorney in Owen County, Kentucky, in 1850. Household owned eight enslaved persons in Owen County in 1850. Attorney in Owen County in 1860. Owned five enslaved persons in Owen County in 1860. Household owned an additional seven enslaved persons in Owen County in 1860. County court judge in Owen County in 1862. County court judge in Owen County in 1864.
